alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 20 at 1:59AM EST until January 21 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Brantley, Inland Glynn, Inland Camden, Northeastern Charlton, Southern Ware and Western Charlton Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
